name: Estonian Environmental Law Center
goal:
EELC offers legal expert knowledge for shaping and implementation of environmental law, in order to defend public interests.

Our aim is that norms of environmental law and their implementation guarantee clean and healthy environment and biological diversity.
interests: Climate Action, Environment, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Trans-European Networks
euInitiatives: Review of Nature Directives, review of Environmental Liability Directive, review of PCIs in the field of energy
